summary: Anna Fritz, a famous and beautiful actress, has died recently. Three young men sneak into the morgue to see her naked, fascinated by her beauty.
cast: Alba Ribas|Cristian Valencia|Albert Carbó|Bernat Saumell|Belén Fabra|Montserrat Miralles|Henry Morales|Daniel Aser|Julia Lara|Mar Cortés|Gemma Nierga|David Picó|Carles Vera|Aurora Redón|Mark Ullod|Ricard Méndez
title: El cadáver de Anna Fritz
